headline: Halliburton Announces Dividend
summary: HOUSTON, November 18, 2024--Halliburton Company (NYSE: HAL) announced today that its board of directors has declared a 2024 fourth quarter dividend of seventeen cents ($0.17) a share on the Company’s common stock payable on December 26, 2024, to shareholders of record at the close of business on December 4, 2024.
